introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At OPTUS, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our customers' personal data. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our automation services and intelligent agents.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect different types of information to provide and improve our services:

types.contact: Contact information: Name, email, phone number, and company.
types.technical: Technical information: IP address, browser type, operating system, and platform usage data.
types.automation: Automation data: Information necessary to configure and run intelligent agents in your business processes.
types.payment: Payment information: Data necessary to process transactions (securely processed by certified third parties).

dataUsage.title: 3. Use of Information
dataUsage.description: We use the collected information to:
purposes: Provide, maintain, and improve our automation services
Personalize your experience with our intelligent agents
Process transactions and send related notifications
Communicate with you about updates, technical support, and service offers
Analyze platform usage to optimize our services
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement advanced technical and organizational security measures to protect your data:
measures: Data encryption in transit and at rest using SSL/TLS protocols
Strict access controls and multi-factor authentication
Continuous security monitoring and regular audits
Automatic data backup with geographic redundancy
Compliance with international information security standards

dataSharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We only share data when:
conditions: It is necessary to provide the requested service
Required by law or to protect our legal rights
Necessary for integrations with third-party platforms authorized by you

userRights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights: Access your personal data that we have in our systems
Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
Request deletion of your personal data
Object to the processing of your data for certain purposes
Request portability of your data to another provider

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless the law requires or permits a longer retention period. Automation data and configurations are maintained while your account is active.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our platform, analyze service usage, and personalize content. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings.

policyChanges.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes through a notice on our platform or by email. We recommend reviewing this page regularly.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, you can contact us:

delete.title: Information Deletion Request
delete.intro: At OPTUS, we respect your right to privacy and control over your personal data. This page allows you to request the complete deletion of your personal information from our systems.

warning.title: Warning:
warning.content: Data deletion is permanent and irreversible. Once your request is processed, we cannot recover your information, conversation history, configurations, or any data associated with your account.

dataToDelete.title: What Information Will Be Deleted?
dataToDelete.description: When requesting the deletion of your information, the following data will be deleted:

types.account: Account data: Name, email, phone number, company information.
types.configuration: Configuration data: Workflows, personalized AI agents, integrations.
types.communications: Communication history: WhatsApp messages and other stored channels.
types.billing: Billing data: Payment information and transaction history.
types.usage: Usage data: Activity logs, metrics and analytics associated with your account.
types.support: Support data: Tickets, conversations and related documentation.

dataToRetain.title: Information We May Retain
dataToRetain.description: For legal, accounting or security reasons, we may retain certain information:
items: Data required by legal or tax obligations (up to 7 years).
Information necessary to resolve disputes or enforce agreements.
Anonymized or aggregated data that does not personally identify you.
Security backups that will be automatically deleted according to our rotation cycle.

process.title: Deletion Process
process.description: To request the deletion of your information, complete the form below:

options.no-use: I no longer use the service

details.label: Additional Details (optional)
details.placeholder: Provide any additional information you consider relevant...

accountId.label: Account or User ID (if you know it)

form.confirmDeletion: I confirm that I understand this action is permanent and irreversible, and that all my data will be deleted from OPTUS systems.
form.confirmBackup: I understand that OPTUS may retain certain information for legal obligations and that security backups will be deleted according to the standard rotation cycle.
form.successMessage: Your email client will open to send the request. Please send the email to complete your deletion request.

afterSubmission.title: What Happens After Submitting the Request?
steps: Identity Verification: You will receive a confirmation email to verify your identity and the authenticity of the request.
Review: Our team will review your request within 5 business days.
Final Confirmation: We will send you a final confirmation before proceeding with deletion.
Processing: Once confirmed, we will delete your information within 30 days.
Completion Notification: You will receive a notification when the process is finished.

alternatives.title: Alternatives to Complete Deletion
alternatives.description: If you're not sure you want to completely delete your information, consider these alternatives:
options: Account deactivation: You can temporarily deactivate your account without deleting data.
Selective deletion: You can request to delete only certain types of data.
Data export: Download a copy of your information before deleting it.
Subscription cancellation: Cancel your plan without deleting your account.

questions.question: How long does it take to process the request?
questions.answer: The complete process takes between 5 and 30 business days from identity verification to complete deletion.

questions.question: Can I recover my account after deleting it?
questions.answer: No. Deletion is permanent and we cannot recover deleted accounts or data.

questions.question: What happens to my active subscriptions?
questions.answer: Your subscription will be automatically cancelled. No more charges will be processed after deletion.

questions.question: Will my clients also lose access to their data?
questions.answer: Yes. If your account is deleted, your clients will no longer be able to interact with your AI agents or access the services you provided.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have questions about the deletion process or need assistance:

delete.note: Note: If you only want to update your information or make changes to your account, it is not necessary to delete it. You can manage your data from your account settings or contact us for assistance.

hero.subtitle: Find quick answers to the most common questions about OPTUS and our automation services

content.title: Have questions? We're here to help
content.description: We've compiled the most frequently asked questions from our clients so you can find the information you need quickly and easily.

q1.question: What is OPTUS and how can it help my business?
q1.answer: OPTUS is an intelligent automation platform that uses AI agents to manage your business communications 24/7. Our agents can answer queries, schedule appointments, process payments, and much more through WhatsApp, without human intervention. This allows you to scale your business, improve customer service, and increase sales while reducing operational costs.

q2.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use OPTUS?
q2.answer: No, OPTUS is designed to be extremely easy to use. You don't need programming knowledge or technical experience. Our team handles the initial setup and provides you with an intuitive interface to manage your agents. Additionally, we offer ongoing technical support and training so you can make the most of all platform features.

q3.question: How long does it take to implement OPTUS in my business?
q3.answer: The implementation of OPTUS is fast and efficient. In most cases, your AI agent can be operational in less than 48 hours. The process includes: initial analysis of your needs, personalized agent configuration, integration with your existing systems, and team training. Throughout the entire process, our technical team accompanies you to ensure a smooth transition.

q4.question: What payment methods do you accept and how do they work?
q4.answer: OPTUS offers multiple payment options for your convenience: bank payment QR (compatible with all banks in Bolivia), direct bank transfers, and cryptocurrency payments (Bitcoin, USDT, Ethereum). All payments are processed securely and you receive automatic confirmation. For recurring subscription payments, we also accept direct debit for greater convenience.

cta.description: Our team is ready to help you. Contact us via WhatsApp or email and we'll respond as soon as possible.
